verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things Jesus <S%G2424><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> in Galilee: <S%G1056><s%> for he would <S%G2309><s%> not walk <S%G4043><s%> in Jewry, <S%G2449><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> him.
Now <S%G1161><s%> the Jew's <S%G2453><s%> feast <S%G1859><s%> of tabernacles <S%G4634><s%> was at <S%G1451><s%> hand. <S%G1451><s%>

His brothers <S%G80><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Depart <S%G3327><s%> hence, <S%G1782><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> that your disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may see <S%G2334><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> that you do. <S%G4160><s%>

For there is no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> that does <S%G4160><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing in secret, <S%G2927><s%> and he himself <S%G846><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to be known openly. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3954><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, show <S%G5319><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>
For neither <S%G3761><s%> did his brothers <S%G80><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, My time <S%G2540><s%> is not yet <S%G3768><s%> come: <S%G3918><s%> but your <S%G5212><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> is always <S%G3842><s%> ready. <S%G2092><s%>

The world <S%G2889><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> you; but me it hates, <S%G3404><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I testify <S%G3140><s%> of it, that the works <S%G2041><s%> thereof <S%G3012><s%> <S%G846><s%> are evil. <S%G4190><s%>

Go <S%G305><s%> you up to this <S%G5026><s%> feast: <S%G1859><s%> I go <S%G305><s%> not up yet <S%G3768><s%> to this <S%G5026><s%> feast: <S%G1859><s%> for my time <S%G2540><s%> is not yet <S%G3768><s%> full <S%G4137><s%> come. <S%G4137><s%>
When he had said <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> words to them, he stayed <S%G3306><s%> still in Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

But when <S%G5613><s%> his brothers <S%G80><s%> were gone <S%G305><s%> up, then <S%G5119><s%> went <S%G305><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> up to the feast, <S%G1859><s%> not openly, <S%G5320><s%> but as it were in secret. <S%G2927><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> him at <S%G1722><s%> the feast, <S%G1859><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> is he?

And there was much <S%G4183><s%> murmuring <S%G1112><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> him: for some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> He is a good <S%G18><s%> man: others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> No; <S%G3756><s%> but he deceives <S%G4105><s%> the people. <S%G3793><s%>
However, <S%G3305><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> of him for fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews. <S%G2453><s%>
Now <S%G2235><s%> about the middle <S%G3322><s%> of the feast <S%G1859><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and taught. <S%G1321><s%>

And the Jews <S%G2453><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man letters, <S%G1121><s%> having never <S%G3361><s%> learned? <S%G3129><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> My doctrine <S%G1322><s%> is not mine, <S%G1699><s%> but his that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.

If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> his will, <S%G2307><s%> he shall know <S%G1097><s%> of the doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> whether <S%G4220><s%> it be of God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> whether I speak <S%G2980><s%> of myself. <S%G1683><s%>

He that speaks <S%G2980><s%> of himself <S%G1438><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> glory: <S%G1391><s%> but he that seeks <S%G2212><s%> his glory <S%G1391><s%> that sent <S%G3992><s%> him, the same <S%G3778><s%> is true, <S%G227><s%> and no <S%G3756><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> is in him.

Did not Moses <S%G3475><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you the law, <S%G3551><s%> and yet none <S%G3762><s%> of you keeps <S%G4160><s%> the law? <S%G3551><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> go <S%G2212><s%> you about <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> me?
The people <S%G3793><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> You have <S%G2192><s%> a devil: <S%G1140><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> goes <S%G2212><s%> about <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> you?
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I have <S%G2192><s%> done <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and you all <S%G3956><s%> marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

Moses <S%G3475><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to you circumcision; <S%G4061><s%> (not because <S%G3754><s%> it is of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> but of the fathers; <S%G3962><s%> ) and you on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day circumcise <S%G4059><s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day receive <S%G2983><s%> circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> that the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> should not be broken; <S%G3089><s%> are you angry <S%G5520><s%> at me, because <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> every <S%G3650><s%> whit <S%G3650><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day?
Judge <S%G2919><s%> not according <S%G2596><s%> to the appearance, <S%G3799><s%> but judge <S%G2919><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> judgment. <S%G2920><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them of Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> Is not this <S%G3778><s%> he, whom <S%G3739><s%> they seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill? <S%G615><s%>

But, see, <S%G2396><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> boldly, <S%G3954><s%> and they say <S%G3004><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to him. Do the rulers <S%G758><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> indeed <S%G230><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is the very <S%G230><s%> Christ? <S%G5547><s%>

However, <S%G235><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> man from where <S%G4159><s%> he is: but when <S%G3752><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> he is.

Then <S%G3767><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the temple <S%G2411><s%> as he taught, <S%G1321><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> You both <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> me, and you know <S%G1492><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> I am: <S%G1510><s%> and I am not come <S%G2064><s%> of myself, <S%G1683><s%> but he that sent <S%G3992><s%> me is true, <S%G228><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you know <S%G1492><s%> not.
But I know <S%G1492><s%> him: for I am <S%G1510><s%> from him, and he has sent <S%G649><s%> me.

Then <S%G3767><s%> they sought <S%G2212><s%> to take <S%G4084><s%> him: but no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> his hour <S%G5610><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

And many <S%G4183><s%> of the people <S%G3793><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> will he do <S%G4160><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> miracles <S%G4592><s%> than these <S%G5130><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man has done? <S%G4160><s%>

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that the people <S%G3793><s%> murmured <S%G1111><s%> such <S%G5023><s%> things concerning <S%G4012><s%> him; and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> to take <S%G4084><s%> him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them, Yet <S%G2089><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G5550><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> I with you, and then <S%G3767><s%> I go <S%G5217><s%> to him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.
You shall seek <S%G2212><s%> me, and shall not find <S%G2147><s%> me: and where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> thither you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> will <S%G3195><s%> he go, <S%G4198><s%> that we shall not find <S%G2147><s%> him? will <S%G3195><s%> he go <S%G4198><s%> to the dispersed <S%G1290><s%> among the Gentiles, <S%G1672><s%> and teach <S%G1321><s%> the Gentiles? <S%G1672><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> manner of saying <S%G3056><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> that he said, <S%G2036><s%> You shall seek me, and shall not find <S%G2147><s%> me: and where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> thither you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> come? <S%G2064><s%>

In the last <S%G2078><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> that great <S%G3173><s%> day of the feast, <S%G1859><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and cried, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man thirst, <S%G1372><s%> let him come <S%G2064><s%> to me, and drink. <S%G4095><s%>

He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me, as the scripture <S%G1124><s%> has said, <S%G2036><s%> out of his belly <S%G2836><s%> shall flow <S%G4482><s%> rivers <S%G4215><s%> of living <S%G2198><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>

(But this <S%G5124><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> he of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him should <S%G3195><s%> receive: <S%G2983><s%> for the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> was not yet <S%G3768><s%> given; because <S%G3754><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not yet <S%G3764><s%> glorified. <S%G1392><s%>)

Many <S%G4183><s%> of the people <S%G3793><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Of a truth <S%G230><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

Others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the Christ. <S%G5547><s%> But some <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Shall Christ <S%G5547><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> out of Galilee? <S%G1056><s%>

Has not the scripture <S%G1124><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> That Christ <S%G5547><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> of the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> and out of the town <S%G2968><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> was?
So <S%G3767><s%> there was a division <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of him.
And some <S%G5100><s%> of them would <S%G2309><s%> have taken <S%G4084><s%> him; but no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> the officers <S%G5257><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and Pharisees; <S%G5330><s%> and they said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G1302><s%> have you not brought <S%G71><s%> him?
The officers <S%G5257><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> man <S%G444><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> like <S%G3779><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Are you also <S%G2532><s%> deceived? <S%G4105><s%>
Have any <S%G3387><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him?
But this <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> not the law <S%G3551><s%> are cursed. <S%G1944><s%>
Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, (he that came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus <S%G846><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them,)

Does our law <S%G3551><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> any <S%G3588><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> before <S%G3362><s%> <S%G4386><s%> it hear <S%G191><s%> him, and know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> he does? <S%G4160><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Are <S%G1488><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> of Galilee? <S%G1056><s%> Search, <S%G2045><s%> and look: <S%G1492><s%> for out of Galilee <S%G1056><s%> rises <S%G1453><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> prophet. <S%G4396><s%>
And every <S%G1538><s%> man went <S%G4198><s%> to his own house. <S%G3624><s%>
